example of the kind of tile escape technique right because we got a door
going into the tower from the lower level and I made the lower the higher
levels out of wood right because they're built inside the tower
the lowest floor beat would be stone and then the the upper floors would be some
would be wood but here I've got a Observatory and you can see I've got a
window there like the tile escape window I've got the telescope artifact there on

but there's an example of the wooden base in play so these are really great
to use and you really I like them because you don't really have to cut
